page.title: 09Sywell C of E Primary School
page.content: The youngest children start school at 4 years old. At 11 they transfer to Moulton Comprehensive School. They travel there by bus. The children wear a school uniform- grey skirts or trousers, grey or white shirts, bottle green jumpers and a yellow and green striped tie. In summer, the girls wear a green and white striped dress and the boys wear a yellow tee-shirt. The school is divided into 3 classes- 1 infant (4-7yrs) and 2 juniors (7-9, 9-11). There are 3 teachers. There is a secretary/ancillary helper. On Friday mornings the children go by coach to Wellingborough swimming baths. The school attends Church on Friday mornings during Lent, on Sunday at Harvest Festival, and at Christmas. The caretaker looks after the school and keeps it clean. After school we have netball, football and gym clubs.
